name: Practice Platformer
description:
Move with arrow keys. You may need to click into the window if it's not working.

This project was made purely for practice and isn't fully featured.

I'd appreciate feedback although as it's just a practice there's a lot of things wrong with it which I'm already aware of like the camera sometimes get's a bit confused. The art needs a lot of work, and the platforming itself isn't all that fun. The music was also something very quickly made so I'm sure gets boring fast.
